channel.title: Parallel Processing on Glogger
channel.description: Recent content in Parallel Processing on Glogger

item.title: Parallel processing!
item.description: Why Parallel Processing?. Gearman Job Server is the first parallel/distributed processing framework that I’ve learned/worked on which is indeed a very old framework out there. One of the things I like about Gearman is that it’s very generic and you can play around a lot. In the last post I wrote how to setup the gearman job server and in this post I’m going to brief you why we need parallel processing with some examples:
